channel.title: The SaxTips Podcast: Saxophone Lessons and all things around and about the Saxophone.
channel.description: The First and Only Saxophone Workshop on the Web as a Podcast. Hosted by Julius Keilwerth Saxophones endorser Evan Tate. http://www.evantate.com

item.title: SaxTips Podcast #30 - Quick Tip (Audio)
item.description: The SaxTips QuickTip. This episode: Belief and its power. Call in your comments or questions: skype: saxtipspodcast. Or send an email to: evan@evantate.com

item.title: SaxTips Podcast #29 - One Note Theory (Video)
item.description: The first SaxTips Vidcast (Video Podcast). This episode: The One Note Theory. Call in your comments or questions: skype: saxtipspodcast. Or send an email to: evan@evantate.com

item.title: SaxTips Podcast #22 - Your Mouthpiece, Ligature and Reed Setup, 5 Tips to Improve your technique. Listener email.

item.title: SaxTips Podcast #21 - Some thoughts on the death of Michael Brecker
item.description: 1st Movement from "Concerto for Saxophone" by Pierre Max-Dubois. Some thoughts on the death of Michael Brecker. "Digital" by Evan Tate. ChipIn for new "SaxTips" MacBook! Call in your comments or questions: +1-302-476-2517

item.description: A Simpler look at Jazz Improvisation. Music of Evan Tate and Chris Burnett. ChipIn for new "SaxTips" MacBook! Call in your comments or questions: +1-302-476-2517

item.description: Jazz Improvisation: My views. Learning Jazz Standards and My Rant. Call in your comments or questions: +1-302-476-2517

item.title: SaxTips Podcast #17 - A Career in Music, The Music of Saxes
item.description: 1. "Carioca" - Saxaes, Topic: Music as a Career. Call in your questions: +1-302-476-2517

item.title: Two new Saxophone eBooks from Evan Tate
item.description: The Way To Mastery: Saxophone "Workout Book"! & 250 Jazz patterns! The newest saxophone publication from Evan Tate - The Way To Mastery: Saxophone "Workout Book"! These books are designed to give the intermediate to advanced saxophonist a powerful regimen to keep sharp on all necessary skills for today's saxophonist.

item.title: SaxTips Podcast #16 - Topics: Intonation, Reed Tips, Self-taught Saxophone. Music: The Munich Saxophone Family, Saxophonist Anton Harris. Special Summer Offer for SaxTips Podcast listeners.
item.description: 1. Intonation and Tuning: Ensemblespiel, tuning with brass. 2. Reed Tips - switching strengths, rotating reeds, reed preparation 3. Self-taught saxophonist. Music: Munich Saxophone Family: Soul Music / Strings Inside. Go to: www.thomaszoller.com. Anton Harris: Modern Mythology / Grey Matter. Go to: www.antonharris.com or http://cdbaby.com/cd/ahq

item.title: SaxTips Video Alert! - Micheal Brecker
item.description: Videoclip from 1983 with the Micheal Brecker Group playing "Take A Walk".

item.title: SaxTips Video Alert! - John Coltrane
item.description: Videoclip from 1965 with the John Coltrane Quartet playing "Naima".

item.title: SaxTips Video Alert! - David Liebman
item.description: Interview and concert clips with David Liebman on Bret Primack's Jazz Video Podcast. David Liebman is truly one of today's most important saxophonists and jazz educators. Check out the video!
